name: Amazing Stories
summary_text: Reimagining the anthology from visionary Steven Spielberg, "Amazing Stories," executive produced by Spielberg, will transport the audience to worlds of wonder through the lens of today's most imaginative filmmakers, directors, and writers.

name: High Tension
summary_text: Best friends Marie and Alexia decide to spend a quiet weekend at Alexia's parents' secluded farmhouse. But on the night of their arrival, the girls' idyllic getaway turns into an endless night of horror.

name: The Five-Year Engagement
summary_text: One year after meeting, Tom proposes to his girlfriend, Violet, but unexpected events keep tripping them up as they look to walk down the aisle together.

name: Femalien: Cosmic Crush
summary_text: The star hopping Alterians are back on a cosmic caper of conjugal consequence. When an ancient hunger is awakened in the far reaches of space, the Alterian High Council sends newly ordained...                See full summary »

name: Without a Paddle
summary_text: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood dream by going on a camping expedition for the lost D. B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

name: The Last Starfighter
summary_text: Video game expert Alex Rogan finds himself transported to another planet after conquering The Last Starfighter video game only to find out it was just a test. He was recruited to join the team of best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

name: How I Met Your Father
summary_text: Sophie and her close-knit group of friends are in the midst of figuring out who they are, what they want out of life, and how to fall in love in the age of dating apps and limitless options.

name: A Hologram for the King
summary_text: A failed American sales rep looks to recoup his losses by traveling to Saudi Arabia and selling his company's product to a wealthy monarch.

name: The Marine
summary_text: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

name: Happy Feet
summary_text: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

name: Girls Trip
summary_text: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival, sisterhoods are rekindled, wild sides are rediscovered, and there's enough dancing, drinking, brawling and romancing to make the Big Easy blush.

name: Benedetta
summary_text: A 17th-century nun in Italy suffers from disturbing religious and erotic visions. She is assisted by a companion, and the relationship between the two women develops into a romantic love affair.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
summary_text: Three musical chipmunks are discovered by an aspiring songwriter who wants to use their amazing singing abilities to become famous.

name: Vagabond
summary_text: An ordinary man who comes across surprising circumstances that place him in the center of a huge corruption scandal.

name: Cuties
summary_text: Amy, an 11-year-old girl, joins a group of dancers named "the cuties" at school, and rapidly grows aware of her burgeoning femininity - upsetting her mother and her values in the process.

name: Sniper: Legacy
summary_text: A rogue assassin is taking out military leaders, and Brandon gets word that his father is one. He tries to track down the killer, finds out that his father isn't dead and realizes that his superior officers are using him as bait to track the killer.

name: Two Moon Junction
summary_text: A young Southern débutante temporarily abandons her posh lifestyle and upcoming, semi-arranged marriage to have a lustful and erotic fling with a rugged drifter who works at a local carnival.

name: V/H/S
summary_text: When a group of misfits are hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire a rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they bargained for.

name: Killjoys
summary_text: In the Quad, a planetary system on the brink of a bloody interplanetary class war, a fun loving trio of bounty hunters attempt to remain impartial as they chase deadly warrants.

name: Taken
summary_text: As former CIA agent Bryan Mills deals with a personal tragedy that shakes his world, he fights to overcome the incident and exact revenge.

name: Taps
summary_text: Military cadets take extreme measures to ensure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.

name: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
summary_text: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

name: The New Adventures of Old Christine
summary_text: A divorced mom tries to keep pace with everyone around her.

name: The Grey
summary_text: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

name: Swimfan
summary_text: A high school senior with a promising swimming career has a one-night stand with consequences.

name: Justice League Unlimited
summary_text: A continuation of the Justice League animated series finds the original members of the team joined in their battle against crime and evil by dozens of other heroes from the DC comics universe.

name: Sex Life
summary_text: Voyeuristic documentary series about titillatingsexual and erotic experiences.

name: Timeline
summary_text: A group of archaeologists become trapped in the past when they go there to retrieve a friend. The group must survive in fourteenth century France before they can escape back to the twenty-first century.

name: Much Ado About Nothing
summary_text: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

name: Vanishing Point
summary_text: During the 1970s, car delivery driver Kowalski delivers hot rods in record time but always runs into trouble with the highway cops.

name: V
summary_text: A year after Liberation Day, courtesy of the red-dust bacteria, the humanoid, lizard-like aliens develop a resistance to the micro-organism and try to regain control of the Earth--only now some humans are knowingly working with them.

name: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
summary_text: Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang solve more mysteries together, each time with a different living, late or fictional celebrity guest.

name: Daddy's Home
summary_text: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

name: Roots
summary_text: A dramatization of author Alex Haley's family line from ancestor Kunta Kinte's enslavement to his descendants' liberation.

name: Smash
summary_text: More drama occurs behind the scenes than on stage, as the team prepares an ambitious Broadway musical on the life of Marilyn Monroe.

name: Please Like Me
summary_text: Twenty something Josh is going through a number of big changes as he navigates his first decade of adulthood. After being dumped by his girlfriend, he comes to the realization that he is gay.

name: Bull Durham
summary_text: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

name: Tales of Wells Fargo
summary_text: Jim Hardie helps Wells Fargo agents battle the bad guys.

name: Seabiscuit
summary_text: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

name: The Butler
summary_text: As Cecil Gaines serves eight presidents during his tenure as a butler at the White House, the civil rights movement, Vietnam, and other major events affect this man's life, family, and American society.

name: Family
summary_text: The joys and heartaches of the Lawrence family of Pasadena, California.

name: A Black Lady Sketch Show
summary_text: A half-hour sketch comedy written by and starring Robin Thede.

name: The Outsider
summary_text: An epic set in post-WWII Japan and centered on an American former G.I. who joins the yakuza.

name: Inside Job
summary_text: Takes a closer look at what brought about the 2008 financial meltdown.

name: Emperor
summary_text: An escaped slave travels north and has chance encounters with Frederick Douglass and John Brown. Based on the life story of Shields Green.

name: The One and Only Ivan
summary_text: A gorilla named Ivan tries to piece together his past with the help of an elephant named Ruby as they hatch a plan to escape from captivity.

name: The Men Who Stare at Goats
summary_text: A reporter in Iraq might just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the U.S. Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

name: The Captive
summary_text: Eight years after the disappearance of Cassandra, some disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she's still alive. Police, parents and Cassandra herself, will try to unravel the mystery of her disappearance.

name: The Vietnam War
summary_text: A comprehensive history of the United States' involvement in the bitterly divisive armed conflict in Southeast Asia.

name: Toy Boy
summary_text: A stripper sets out to prove his innocence for a crime he didn't commit and was unjustly incarcerated for seven years earlier.

name: Angel of Mine
summary_text: A woman grieving over the death of her daughter loses grip of reality when she begins to think her girl may still be alive.

name: Professor Marston & the Wonder Women
summary_text: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his polyamorous relationship with his wife and their mistress who would inspire his creation of the superheroine, Wonder Woman.

name: Three Steps Above Heaven
summary_text: A privileged woman and a reckless man fall in love despite their different social classes.

name: The Secret Garden
summary_text: An orphaned girl discovers a magical garden hidden at her strict uncle's estate.

name: The Stanford Prison Experiment
summary_text: In 1971, twenty-four male students are selected to take on randomly assigned roles of prisoners and guards in a mock prison situated in the basement of the Stanford psychology building.

name: Forbidden Planet
summary_text: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

name: The Art of Self-Defense
summary_text: After being attacked on the street, a young man enlists at a local dojo, led by a charismatic and mysterious sensei, in an effort to learn how to defend himself from future threats.

name: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
summary_text: A human child raised by wolves must face off against a menacing tiger named Shere Khan, as well as his own origins.

name: G.I. Jane
summary_text: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

name: Romance & Cigarettes
summary_text: This down-and-dirty musical set in the world of working-class New York tells the story of a husband's journey into infidelity and redemption when he must choose between his seductive mistress and his beleaguered wife.

name: Silver Streak
summary_text: On a long-distance train trip, a man finds romance but also finds himself in danger of being killed, or at least pushed off the train.

name: Behind Enemy Lines
summary_text: A disillusioned pilot shot down over war-torn Bosnia is ensnared in the conflict in war-torn Bosnia. In the crosshairs of the enemy and an assassin, the spoiled pilot runs for his life as his commanding officer risks all to save him.

name: Inventing the Abbotts
summary_text: Two working class brothers court three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.

name: Detectorists
summary_text: The lives of two eccentric metal detectorists, who spend their days plodding along ploughed tracks and open fields, hoping to disturb the tedium by unearthing the fortune of a lifetime.

name: Barton Fink
summary_text: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

name: 8½
summary_text: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

name: Love for Rent
summary_text: When Defne's brother gets into debt and is held captive, Defne is forced to accept an offer in exchange for the money. She has to make omer, a wealthy shoe designer who owns a company, fall in love with her and marry her.

name: The Real Housewives of New York City
summary_text: A fast-paced reality show that follows several incredibly busy and ambitious Manhattan women. Watch as they balance envious social calendars, challenging careers, and motherhood, with the hustle and bustle of the big city all around.

name: Maurice
summary_text: After his lover rejects him, a young man trapped by the oppressiveness of Edwardian society tries to come to terms with and accept his sexuality.

name: Fences
summary_text: A working-class African-American father tries to raise his family in the 1950s, while coming to terms with the events of his life.

name: Castle in the Sky
summary_text: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

name: Michael Clayton
summary_text: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multibillion-dollar class action suit.

name: Newhart
summary_text: The misadventures of an author turned innkeeper in rural Vermont and his friends.

name: Rocco Schiavone
summary_text: Weed smoking, foulmouthed Rocco Schiavone is an offbeat Deputy Commissioner of the State Police. For disciplinary reasons he is transferred to the Alpine town of Aosta, far from his beloved...                See full summary »

name: Dancer in the Dark
summary_text: An East European girl travels to the United States with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.

name: U.S. Marshals
summary_text: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
summary_text: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

name: History of the World: Part I
summary_text: Mel Brooks brings his one-of-a-kind comic touch to the history of mankind covering events from the Old Testament to the French Revolution in a series of episodic comedy vignettes.

name: Blue Crush
summary_text: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

name: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
summary_text: An Irish boy named Keegan and a Spanish girl named Moya journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

name: Small Crimes
summary_text: A disgraced former cop, fresh off a six-year prison sentence for attempted murder - returns home looking for redemption but winds up trapped in the mess he left behind.

name: Safe
summary_text: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

name: Doomsday
summary_text: A futuristic action thriller where a team of people work to prevent a disaster threatening the future of the human race.

name: Desperately Seeking Susan
summary_text: A bored New Jersey suburban housewife's fascination with a kooky character she's read about in the personal columns leads to her being mistaken for the woman herself.

name: Stuart Little
summary_text: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

name: Broadcast News
summary_text: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

name: Quigley Down Under
summary_text: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Wyoming by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

name: School Ties
summary_text: Set in the 1950s, a star-quarterback is given an opportunity to attend an elite preparatory school but must conceal the fact that he is Jewish.

name: The Tunnel
summary_text: A prominent French politician is found dead on the border between the U.K. and France, and two agents have to work together on behalf of their respective countries to find the murderer.

name: Ordeal by Innocence
summary_text: Christmas 1954. Wealthy philanthropist Rachel Argyll is murdered at her family estate Sunny Point. Her adopted son Jack Argyll is arrested for her murder. He vehemently protests his innocence.

name: The Island of Dr. Moreau
summary_text: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

name: The Remains of the Day
summary_text: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

name: Matilda
summary_text: An adaptation of the Tony and Olivier award-winning musical. Matilda tells the story of an extraordinary girl who, armed with a sharp mind and a vivid imagination, dares to take a stand to change her story with miraculous results.

name: Hero
summary_text: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

name: Seraphim Falls
summary_text: At the end of the Civil War, a colonel hunts down a man with whom he has a grudge.

name: Spare Parts
summary_text: While travelling on their first American tour, Ms. 45, an all-girl punk band, is drugged and kidnapped. They awaken to find their limbs removed and replaced with crude weaponry, and are forced to fight as Gladiators for a sadistic town.

name: Soul Surfer
summary_text: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

name: Niagara
summary_text: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

name: A Raisin in the Sun
summary_text: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

name: United 93
summary_text: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September 11th, 2001 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.
A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

name: Australia
summary_text: Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand.

name: Kill List
summary_text: Nearly a year after a botched job, a hitman takes a new assignment with the promise of a big payoff for three killings. What starts off as an easy task soon unravels, sending the killer into the heart of darkness.

name: Control
summary_text: You are Jesse Faden, a young woman with a troubled past. You become the new Director of the Bureau of Control - Our frontline in researching and fighting against supernatural enemies like the Hiss threatening our very existence.

name: Johnny English Reborn
summary_text: Johnny English goes up against international assassins hunting down Chinese Premier Xiang Ping.

name: The Pretender
summary_text: A specially gifted man, with the ability to instantly master any skill, escapes from a secret testing facility and travels the country taking on different jobs and helping strangers while hiding from his kidnappers.

name: V-Wars
summary_text: Dr. Luther Swann enters a world of horror when a virus is released from ice melting due to climate change.

name: Superintelligence
summary_text: When an all-powerful Superintelligence chooses to study average Carol Peters, the fate of the world hangs in the balance. As the A.I. decides to enslave, save or destroy humanity, it's up to Carol to prove that people are worth saving.

name: Before I Wake
summary_text: A couple adopt an orphaned child whose dreams - and nightmares - manifest physically as he sleeps.

name: The King: Eternal Monarch
summary_text: A modern-day Korean emperor passes through a mysterious portal and into a parallel world, where he encounters a feisty police detective.

name: Falling
summary_text: John Peterson lives with his partner Eric and their adopted daughter in Southern California. When he is visited by his aging father who is searching for a place to retire, their two very different worlds collide.

name: Carrie Pilby
summary_text: A person of high intelligence struggles to make sense of the world as it relates to morality, relationships, sex, and leaving her apartment.

name: The Spectacular Now
summary_text: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

name: Caliphate
summary_text: Agent Fatima gets a tip that a terrorist act is planned in Sweden. At the same time, the teenager Sulle has opened her eyes to her student assistant who opens the doors to a new fascinating world.

name: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
summary_text: A crime boss teams up with a cop to track down a serial killer.

name: Saving Hope
summary_text: A supernatural medical drama that centers on the lives of the doctors and nurses of Hope Zion Hospital.

name: Wildlife
summary_text: A teenage boy must deal with his mother's complicated response after his father temporarily abandons them to take a menial and dangerous job.

name: Roadkill
summary_text: Politician Peter Laurence's private life is falling apart. Shamelessly untroubled by guilt or remorse, he seeks to further his own agenda whilst others plot to bring him down. Can he out-run his own secrets to win the ultimate prize?

name: It Takes Two
summary_text: Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

name: Spider-Man: The Animated Series
summary_text: A young man with spider-like abilities fights crime as a superhero in New York City while trying to have a normal personal life.

name: Emmerdale Farm
summary_text: A soap opera set in a fictional village in the Yorkshire Dales.

name: Then Came You
summary_text: A hypochondriac working as an airport baggage handler is forced to confront his fears when a British teenager with a terminal illness enlists him to help her carry out her eccentric bucket list.

name: Descendants 2
summary_text: Mal, Evie, Carlos and Jay try to adjust to life in Auradon, but Mal becomes overwhelmed with pressure and returns to her roots.

name: Fun with Dick and Jane
summary_text: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

name: The Lovebirds
summary_text: A couple (Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani) experiences a defining moment in their relationship when they are unintentionally embroiled in a murder mystery.

name: Dressed to Kill
summary_text: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

name: Star Trek: Nemesis
summary_text: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty. Captain Picard and his crew discover a serious threat to the Federation once Praetor Shinzon plans to attack Earth.

name: Something Borrowed
summary_text: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.

name: Gator
summary_text: Agents force a former con man to help them nab a corrupt politician.

name: Morgan
summary_text: A corporate risk-management consultant must decide whether or not to terminate an artificially created humanoid being.

name: Accused
summary_text: Created by Jimmy McGovern, each episode of this series examines a person who is accused of a crime and what led them to end up in the Dock.

name: Aloha
summary_text: A celebrated military contractor returns to the site of his greatest career triumphs and reconnects with a long-ago love while unexpectedly falling for the hard-charging Air Force watch-dog assigned to him.

name: The Big Country
summary_text: A New Englander arrives in the Old West, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

name: Strong Girl Bong-soon
summary_text: Do Bong-soon is a woman born with superhuman strength that comes from the long line of women possessing it. when Ahn Min Hyuk, the CEO of ainsoft, a gaming company witnesses her strength he hires her as his personal bodyguard.

name: Encino Man
summary_text: When they find a frozen caveman in their back yard, two high school outcasts thaw him and introduce him to modern life while he in turn gets them to actually enjoy life.

name: Over the Top
summary_text: Tough trucker Lincoln Hawk is determined to win back his son and triumph at the world arm wrestling championships.

name: We Summon the Darkness
summary_text: Three best friends embark on a road trip to a heavy-metal show, where they bond with three aspiring musicians and head off to one of the girls' country home for an after-party.

name: Single Parents
summary_text: A group of single parents form their own support system as they raise their kids and struggle to start new relationships.

name: The Iceman
summary_text: The story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor daughters had any clue about his real profession.

name: Klovn
summary_text: The socially awkward misadventures of Frank Hvam, his girlfriend Mia and his best friend Casper.

name: 10,000 BC
summary_text: In the prehistoric past, D'Leh is a mammoth hunter who bonds with the beautiful Evolet. When warriors on horseback capture Evolet and the tribesmen, D'Leh must embark on an odyssey to save his true love.

name: Dance Moms
summary_text: The series follows doting mothers and their childrens' early steps on the road to stardom, all under the discerning eye of a notoriously demanding and passionate dance instructor.

name: The Dark Crystal
summary_text: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

name: Black Rain
summary_text: Two NYC cops arrest a Yakuza member and must escort him when he's extradited to Japan.

name: The Human Centipede II (Full Sequence)
summary_text: Inspired by the fictional Dr. Heiter, disturbed loner Martin dreams of creating a 12-person centipede and sets out to realize his sick fantasy.

name: The Glass Castle
summary_text: A young girl comes of age in a dysfunctional family of nonconformist nomads with a mother who's an eccentric artist and an alcoholic father who would stir the children's imagination with hope as a distraction to their poverty.

name: Romantic
summary_text: Add a Plot

name: Ghost Lab
summary_text: After witnessing a haunting in their hospital, two doctors become dangerously obsessed with obtaining scientific proof that ghosts exist.

name: Stranger
summary_text: With the help of a gutsy female detective, a prosecutor who has almost lost the ability to feel emotions tackles a strange murder case amid political corruption.

name: Upstairs, Downstairs
summary_text: The trials of the British aristocratic Bellamy family and their household staff.

name: The Mick
summary_text: A hard-living aunt is forced to take care of her wealthy sister's spoiled kids after the mom flees the country to avoid criminal charges.

name: Wu-Tang: An American Saga
summary_text: The show tracks the Wu Tang Clan's formation, a vision of Bobby Diggs, who strives to unite a dozen young, black men that are torn between music and crime but eventually rise to become the unlikeliest of American success stories.

name: Big City Greens
summary_text: The adventurous life of Cricket Green, a country boy who moves with his family from their rural farm to a modern metropolis.

name: Toast of London
summary_text: Steven Toast, an eccentric middle aged actor with a chequered past, spends more time dealing with his problems off stage than performing on it

name: Mixte
summary_text: You'd think boys would be glad to see girls attend their high school? Not at all. When Voltaire High becomes coed in 1963 France and for the first time a handful of girls take classes alongside boys, a whole world is knocked off balance.

name: Charlotte's Web
summary_text: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

name: Selma
summary_text: A chronicle of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s campaign to secure equal voting rights via an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, in 1965.

name: Black Book
summary_text: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

name: Oworui Cheongchun
summary_text: Set in 1980s during the Gwangju Uprising, Youth of May tells the love story of a medical student Hwang Hee Tae and a nurse Kim Myung Hee.

name: Underworld: Evolution
summary_text: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

name: The Kids in the Hall
summary_text: The TV series of the Canadian sketch comedy troupe that, more often than not, puts bizarre, unique, and insane twists in their skits.

name: Get Him to the Greek
summary_text: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

name: ZIWE
summary_text: ZIWE, a riotously funny, new variety series from writer, comedian and internet sensation, Ziwe. A no-holds-barred mix of musical numbers, interviews and sketches that challenge America's discomfort with race, politics, and cultural issues.

name: Chick Fight
summary_text: When Anna Wyncomb is introduced to an underground, all-female fight club in order to turn the mess of her life around, she discovers she is much more personally connected to the history of the club than she could ever imagine.

name: One Sunday Afternoon
summary_text: Biff Grimes has spent the last ten years regretting that he hadn't married Virginia Brush, the girl of his dreams. Virginia ran off and married his best friend - breaking his heart. Virginia's best friend, Amy, consoles Biff.

name: My Two Dads
summary_text: When Marcy Bradford dies, she leaves her teenage daughter, Nicole, in the custody of two ex-boyfriends - Michael, a straight-laced and formal man, and Joey, a wild artist.

name: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
summary_text: In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.

name: The Haunting
summary_text: A study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.

name: Skyline
summary_text: Strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the Earth.

name: I Am Your Man
summary_text: In order to obtain research funds for her studies, a scientist accepts an offer to participate in an extraordinary experiment: for three weeks, she is to live with a humanoid robot, created to make her happy.

name: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
summary_text: An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris (Sam Rockwell), in which he purports to have been a C.I.A. hitman.

name: What About Bob?
summary_text: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

name: Karppi
summary_text: When Sofia Karppi discovers the body of a young woman on a construction site, she triggers a chain of events that threatens to destroy her life again.

name: The Uninvited
summary_text: Anna returns home after a stint in a mental hospital, but her recovery is jeopardized by her cruel stepmother and ghastly visions of her dead mother.

name: Pinocchio
summary_text: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

name: Dummy
summary_text: An aspiring writer befriends her boyfriend's sex doll and the two take on the world together.

name: Mute
summary_text: A mute bartender goes up against his city's gangsters in an effort to find out what happened to his missing partner.

name: Au Revoir, Chris Hemsworth
summary_text: Venice: A city full of beauty, love, music, and brutal trash talk. Join the Pom's team in saying "Au Revoir, Chris Hemsworth".

name: The Player
summary_text: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

name: Cinderella
summary_text: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

name: Cabin Fever
summary_text: Five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.

name: Klute
summary_text: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

name: Baby's Day Out
summary_text: After three kidnappers lose the baby they have kidnapped, both the cops and kidnappers go looking for the baby.

name: Tears of the Sun
summary_text: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

name: Being There
summary_text: A simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.

name: The Love Punch
summary_text: A divorced couple scheme to recover the retirement money that was stolen from them.

name: Pink Floyd: The Wall
summary_text: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

name: Love Story
summary_text: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

name: Rocky V
summary_text: Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success.

name: Tango & Cash
summary_text: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

name: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
summary_text: Johnny Blaze, tortured by the Ghost Rider's curse, gets a chance of redemption through protecting the Devil's son, whose father is pursuing him.

name: Boogie
summary_text: Coming-of-age story of Alfred "Boogie" Chin, a basketball phenom living in Queens, New York, who dreams of one day playing in the NBA. While his parents pressure him to focus on earning a scholarship to an elite college, Boogie must find a way to navigate a new girlfriend, high school, on-court rivals and the burden of expectation.

name: The Barkleys of Broadway
summary_text: A married musical team splits up so the wife can become a serious actress.

name: Arsène Lupin
summary_text: As the daring thief Arsène Lupin (Romain Duris) ransacks the homes of wealthy Parisians, the Police, with a secret weapon in their arsenal, attempt to ferret him out.

name: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
summary_text: Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booth's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.

name: Rise of Empires: Ottoman
summary_text: Ottoman Sultan Mehmed II wages an epic campaign to take the Byzantine capital of Constantinople and shapes the course of history for centuries.

name: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
summary_text: A parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance Boyz n the Hood (1991), South Central (1992), Menace II Society (1993), Higher Learning (1995) and Juice (1992).

name: Broken Flowers
summary_text: As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.

name: 3 Ninjas
summary_text: Each year, three brothers visit their grandfather for the summer. He is highly skilled in ninjutsu, and for years he has trained the boys in his techniques.

name: The Guardian
summary_text: Nick Fallin is a hotshot lawyer working at his father's ultrasuccessful Pittsburgh law firm. Unfortunately, the high life has gotten the best of Nick.

name: Serial Mom
summary_text: She's the perfect all-American parent: a great cook and homemaker, a devoted recycler, and a woman who'll literally kill to keep her children happy.

name: Rogue
summary_text: Grace, an undercover detective, is tormented by the possibility that she might have contributed to her son's mysterious death. While trying to uncover the truth, she gets involved with a dangerous criminal.

name: Occupation
summary_text: A small group of town residents have to band together after a devastating ground invasion. As they struggle to survive, they realize they must stay one step ahead of their attackers, and work together for a chance to strike back.

name: The First Wives Club
summary_text: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

name: Sailor Moon
summary_text: The magical action-adventures of a teenage girl who learns of her destiny as the legendary warrior Sailor Moon and must band together with the other Sailor Scouts to defend the Earth and Galaxy.

name: It Happened One Night
summary_text: A renegade reporter and a crazy young heiress meet on a bus heading for New York, and end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

name: 24: Live Another Day
summary_text: Jack Bauer comes out of hiding in London to stop a huge terrorist attack on British soil.

name: Happiness
summary_text: The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

name: 30 Minutes or Less
summary_text: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

name: Centurion
summary_text: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is devastated in a guerrilla attack.

name: Game Over, Man!
summary_text: Three friends are on the verge of getting their video game financed when their benefactor is taken hostage by terrorists.

name: Crossroads
summary_text: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a road trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

name: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
summary_text: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken control of a New York City media mogul's high-tech skyscraper.

name: Graceland
summary_text: A rookie FBI agent is sent to a house for undercover agents in Southern California, where he is trained by a former legend FBI agent.

name: Mr. Mom
summary_text: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

name: Book Club
summary_text: Four lifelong friends have their lives forever changed after reading 50 Shades of Grey in their monthly book club.

name: The Last King of Scotland
summary_text: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s.

name: The Toy
summary_text: An underemployed reporter finds himself literally purchased as a toy for a rich spoiled brat.

name: Percy Vs Goliath
summary_text: A Canadian farmer takes on a giant corporation after their GMOs interfere with his crops.

name: Land of the Dead
summary_text: The living dead have taken over the world, and the last humans live in a walled city to protect themselves as they come to grips with the situation.

name: Velvet
summary_text: A feel-good, compelling Spanish story of a fashion house in Madrid in the late 50's, which is scene to money, fashion, drama, entanglements, love, jealousies, plots, counter-plots involving its owners, customers and residential employees.

name: Alice in Wonderland
summary_text: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

name: The Baby-Sitters Club
summary_text: Based on the book series of the same name focusing on a group of young girls who start their own babysitting service.

name: Cousins
summary_text: Entwines the very different lives of three Maori girls, cousins, through tumultuous decades, after one of them is taken from her family and raised in an orphanage.

name: Running Scared
summary_text: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.

name: Red Heat
summary_text: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

name: The Boys from Brazil
summary_text: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

name: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
summary_text: A 34-year-old Japanese NEET is run over by a speeding truck and dies. Before he knows it, he is reborn as Rudeus Greyrat, and begins a new life full of adventure.

name: Muriel's Wedding
summary_text: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

name: The Constant Gardener
summary_text: A widower is determined to get to the bottom of a potentially explosive secret involving his wife's murder, big business, and corporate corruption.

name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
summary_text: Central Europe, 1968: A Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

name: Page Eight
summary_text: Johnny works for MI5. His neighbor Nancy approaches him. When his best friend and boss suddenly dies, Johnny's left to sort out things about the PM, MI5 and US.

name: The Miseducation of Cameron Post
summary_text: In 1993, a teenage girl is forced into a gay conversion therapy center by her conservative guardians.

name: The Book Thief
summary_text: While subjected to the horrors of World War II Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. In the basement of her home, a Jewish refugee is being protected by her adoptive parents.

name: Mr. Mayor
summary_text: A wealthy businessman becomes the mayor of Los Angeles.

name: Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star
summary_text: A kid from the Midwest moves out to Hollywood in order to follow in his parents footsteps, and become a porn star.

name: The Legend of Billie Jean
summary_text: A Texas teenager cuts her hair short and becomes an outlaw martyr with her brother and friends.

name: The Great Beauty
summary_text: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

name: 24 Hours to Live
summary_text: An assassin seeks redemption after being given a second chance at life.

name: Reprisal
summary_text: A woman sets out for revenge against the gang that tried to kill her.

name: Summer School
summary_text: Freddy the gym teacher has to teach remedial English in summer (high) school, if he wants tenure. As he can only teach gym and his students want fun, emphasis is on "field trips" - until he's fired unless all his students pass the test.

name: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
summary_text: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.

name: Dave
summary_text: An uncanny Presidential lookalike named Dave is recruited by the Secret Service to become a momentary stand-in for the President of the United States.

name: National Lampoon's European Vacation
summary_text: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

name: The Blob
summary_text: A deadly entity from space crashes near a small town and begins consuming everyone in its path. Panic ensues as shady government scientists try to contain the horrific creature.

name: The Muppets
summary_text: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

name: Patch Adams
summary_text: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter "Patch" Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.

name: Doubt
summary_text: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.

name: Conjuring the Devil
summary_text: A woman who is struggling with the conflict between her faith and her personal life must defend herself against the spirit of a demonic nun who is bent on destroying her.

name: Crimson Tide
summary_text: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.
